post.body: That was glorious.
Spies and Snipers are frequently my downfall. Strangely, they're also often my best classes.
I know all too well how that feels. I'm finding tons of modders on the 360, these days.
I've only read the last two of Zahn's Thrawn trilogy, and a two Jedi Academy books a long time ago.
Curses, sent it too soon. I'd love to see del Toro's take on things. How about Tarantino? (LULZ)
Abrams wouldn't do any worse than Lucas.
Also, I feel that the novels have already done the best job of interpreting much of the post-movies universe.
It probably couldn't involve Han, Leia, Luke, etc. though, if it were live action. So that's a minus.
I would love to see the prequels rewritten and reshot, with a competent writer and director.
Dammit, just about EVERYONE in the prequels was filled with wasted potential.
Darth Maul was about as horribly wasted as Sam Raimi's Venom was. Great potential, reduced to an afterthought of a villain.
I could maybe convince myself to watch 2 and 3. PM, however, has nothing to it that could ever convince me to watch it again
Phantom Menace was easily the worst of the three, for me.
Most disappointing, maybe. But I felt it had the highest quality of the three.
It's probably the least painful of the prequels, though.
I didn't think that was possible.
Hey, congrats!
Oh, I thought we were speaking in code.
I know, and the banjo plays at midnight, amirite?
Hey, this is "Hugh Beaumont," by the way. Totally not just some random, ill-intentioned stalker.
That's a favorite of mine. It goes well with Modern Guilt, IMO.
I was expecting it to be a lot of mopey nothingness with one or two good singles, but it's actually really solid.
Congratulations!
LOL @ spoilers
I'll be on in, like, 20 minutes, probably.
I know I'm no Sophia, but I'll probably be on AIM soon, if you're still there.
It will be. :)
There are still a few hours left. Maybe you can salvage it a bit?
I feel like the day has been driving around in the wrong gear. From the moment I woke up, things just seem... misfired. Boo.
I'm wondering that same thing.
You can't always have it, but I don't think there's anything wrong with shooting for it. You have to, or else it won't come.
I know you're probably not going anywhere near me, but... YAY NEW JERSEY!
You're awesome. :)
I heard that, too. Only time will tell...
So, can you come with me to all my social and family events, then? 'Cause I usually end up in that same corner.
At least they'll always be smiling.
Well, make sure the Awesome Glands aren't producing too much Awesome. It can wear your body out.
And that's with a controller, by the way. Eat it, PC suckas.
I've stopped in the middle of my TF2 match to tell you this: I am a fricking awesome Sniper. That is all.
This explains a whole hell of a lot. http://www.theonion.com/content//node/90276
Goddammit. I hate meeting new people. It can only go one of two ways: Really freaking awesome or really fucking awful. Rarely in between.
Watching the best of SNL's Digital Shorts. They really are awesome, when they're "on." http://tinyurl.com/6r4zqe
Brilliant. Simply brilliant. http://tinyurl.com/6p6n3x
Gosh, I am such a social dynamo.
In fact, today is just a Beck day, all around.
Just picked up Beck's "Modern Guilt" on Amazon MP3 for $5. I'm really surprised and impressed with it. BUY IT. http://tinyurl.com/58pqgf
To all of you who still use Internet Explorer... LOL. Stop using it. Microsoft says so. http://tinyurl.com/6awdyy
I've been seriously neglecting my MST3K site. I really need to get my readership back. I'm such a terrible blogger.
I wonder if there's any place to find uncensored versions of Jimmy Kimmel's and Sarah Silverman's Damon/Affleck songs. The bleeps ruin them.
"I want to be more 'Merchant Ivory.' Not so much 'Merchant Ivory Wayans.'"
I don't know why I'm watching this Louis Theroux doc about the Phelps family. It's only making my blood boil.
Radiohead's "Let Down" is such a strangely beautiful song. I never expect it to be.
lawl: http://i36.tinypic.com/jpdd6x.jpg
Remember when I asked for music-buying suggestions, the other week? I finally found my winner: http://tinyurl.com/9nn7ao
So, I'm listening to iMeem for a change, and the song they just put on is "Touch My Tra La La". I just can't manage to hit "next."
I want to skip today. Today was a mistake. I would like to exchange it for tomorrow.
Oh shit. Fox won their lawsuit over Watchmen. The movie is officially in jeopardy. http://tinyurl.com/89tmsx
Social. Sorry, I'm feeling silly. Must be all the CHRISTMAS.
The games are largely simple knock-offs of classic games, but it's still pretty fun. Good time waster. And social. Did I mention social?
If anyone's interested, there's an entertaining new social gaming site here: http://www.iminlikewithyou.com/
